BROGUN
BROGUNSON
column8:
Hayato 
Yuki 
Ōshiro Mugen
Takuma 
Aiko 
Kuma
Shogun
Ryūnosuke
Yabu
Okkoto
Noboru
Masaru
column10:
1) Takuma wants revenge on Yabu.
2) Yabu lets someone commit Seppuku, setting up later Seppuku scenes
3) We learn Yabu is not Kage-Sama. Takuma wants to kill him anyway.
4) Killing Yabu fills Takuma with triumph, but he feels empty in the end.
5) Later, he will find new meaning in life by taking Yuki under his wing.
The team has snuck close to the mansion's outer wall.
EN
Lord Yabu's Estate
More guards than last time. Guess Lord Yabu wants to make this challenging.
column12: 守卫比上次多了。看来薮大名还想给我们增加点难度。

column10: He knows I have been freed. His fears are well justified.
column12: 他知道我逃走了，所以加强戒备也不奇怪。

column10: Three bodyguards, armoured clothing, never leaves the courtyard ... don't think we should attack head on.
column12: 有三个全副武装的贴身保镖，而且寸步不离庭院……正面进攻是不行了。

column10: He drinks tea, right?
… what?
He always drinks tea on that little island.
column12: 他常在那个小岛上喝茶哦。

column10: Heh, not a bad idea. Take this flask, child. You can add a little death to his drink.
column12: 哦…好主意！这个瓶子给你。往茶里放一点就足以送他上路了。

column10: What about that tower? Think you can take the shot from there.
column12: 那座塔怎么样？你应该能从那上面狙击。

column10: Hmm, not impossible, if we manage to coax him out of cover first.
column12: 嗯…也可以，但要先把他从庭院里引出来。

column10: His bodyguards, they'll see him die, yes? Then everyone will search for us …
column12: 他的手下会发现主子被杀吧？到时候，所有人都会来找我们了……

column10: Sounds like the perfect moment to use those matchlock pistols you gave us.
column12: 到那时候，你给我们的火绳枪就该派上用场了。

column10: Hmm, we should save them until that point. I also brought a couple of bombs, in case things get dire.
column12: 嗯，万不得已的时候再用吧。我还带了一些手雷，以解燃眉之急。

column10: Heh … good to know. Alright, let's get going.
column12: 哈哈……那太好了。那么，开始行动吧！

column10: Takuma orders his Tanuki to a specific spot.
column12: Takuma orders his Tanuki to a specific spot.

column10: EN
Go, Kuma!
He's cute! Is he your friend?
column12: 真可爱！他是你的朋友吗？

column10: Heh, you could say that.
Takuma orders his Tanuki to make noise.
column12: Takuma orders his Tanuki to make noise.

column10: EN
Distract them!
Oh, he's clever!
That he certainly is.
Takuma calls back his Tanuki.
EN
Kuma, come back!
Never seen a tame tanuki. How did you train it?
column12: 从来没见过驯化的狸猫。你是怎么训练它的？

column10: Hehe, what makes you think I trained him? Maybe it's the other way around?
column12: 呵呵呵，你怎么知道是我在训练他？也许恰恰相反呢？

column10: Uhuh.
Yuki kills someone with her knife. Takuma pays attention to this for the first time.
column12: Yuki kills someone with her knife. Takuma pays attention to this for the first time.

column10: EN
You are quick with the knife. Your life was hard?
column12: 你小刀用得很熟练。看来以前过得很苦吧？

column10: When you're alone, sometimes people want to hurt you, yes? People like that, I hurt them so bad they'll never try again.
column12: 有些人看我孤身一人就想欺负我。这种人我会让他们尝尝苦头，以后就再也不敢来欺负我。

column9: knows there is a better way
column10: Hmm, an effective strategy, I'm sure.
column12: 嗯，确实是很有效的方法。

column10: Yuki sets up her trap. Takuma evaluates the design.
column12: Yuki sets up her trap. Takuma evaluates the design.

column10: EN
Hmm, a curious design. Yours?
column12: 唔，设计得真巧妙，是你的东西吗？

column10: Mhm! It sleeps most of the time, but it gets really excited when you wind it up.
column12: 嗯！这孩子大部分时间都在睡觉，但只要上紧发条，就会变得很兴奋。

column10: Hehe, is that so? I'd like to see how it works. Perhaps you'll show me later?
column12: 嘿嘿，这样啊？我想看看它的工作原理。一会儿你能给我演示一下吗？

column10: Yes … if you want.
Either Hayato or Yuki spot a sniper on a tower near the perimeter wall.
column12: Either Hayato or Yuki spot a sniper on a tower near the perimeter wall.

column10: EN
Tower is manned!
Look! There's one, on the tower!
Aah. The perfect time to test my new long range rifle.
column12: 啊，这是测试我新狙击枪的绝佳机会。

column10: Takuma uses his sniper rifle, which consists of his wooden leg and walking cane.
column12: Takuma uses his sniper rifle, which consists of his wooden leg and walking cane.

column10: EN
What was that?
Hrm … The stock needs reinforcing.
There's a pistol in your leg! Did you build it?
column12: 你腿里藏了把枪！是你造的吗？

column10: A hidden firearm … your leg's the base, your cane's the barrel ... not a bad idea old man.
column12: 隐藏式火器么……木腿是枪身，手杖是枪管……老爷子你这想法不错嘛。

column10: Hehe, I'm glad you like it.
column12: 呵呵，很高兴你们喜欢它。

column10: Takuma uses his rifle to snipe another enemy.
column12: Takuma uses his rifle to snipe another enemy.

column10: EN
Heh, hands are still steady.
It's so quiet. I bet there's a trick to it …
column12: 枪声竟然那么小。这枪里肯定有古怪……

column10: Oh, very tricky! No way a little child could understand.
column12: 唔，这里面门道可多了！不过小孩是看不懂的。

column10: Not fair!
The team approaches the gate in the mansion's outer wall. It is guarded by a samurai.
column12: The team approaches the gate in the mansion's outer wall. It is guarded by a samurai.

column10: EN
Samurai at the gate.
There's a mean looking samurai at the gate.
column12: 大门那有个很凶的武士。

column10: Hmm ... we lack Mugen's power. No matter. Samurai armour does not protect against good strategy.
column12: 嗯……虽然无限不在，但不要紧。武士的盔甲也抵挡不住好的战术。

column10: Hayato or Yuki climb up some vines or a rope, which Takuma can't do.
column12: Hayato or Yuki climb up some vines or a rope, which Takuma can't do.

column10: EN
I'll go up.
Let's see what's up there.
Hehe, so much youthful energy!
column12: 呵呵，年轻人果然生龙活虎！

column10: When they scouted the mansion earlier, Hayato prepared a plank that would help them get over the mansion wall.
column12: When they scouted the mansion earlier, Hayato prepared a plank that would help them get over the mansion wall.

column10: EN
Right where I left you.
Yes, they didn't find the plank! You're so clever, Hayato-sensei!
column12: 太好了，他们没发现这块木板！您真机智，隼人师父！

column9: doesn't want to be called sensei
column10: Let's use it to get over the wall, shall we.
column12: 快点把木板搭好翻墙吧？

column10: Takuma climbs a watchtower via a ladder. Maybe he can snipe a few guards from up there.
column12: Takuma climbs a watchtower via a ladder. Maybe he can snipe a few guards from up there.

column10: EN

column8: feels good to be back in action
column10: Hmm, such an inspiring view. Let's see what we can do from here.
column12: 嗯，如此美景真是赏心悦目。看看我在这里能干点什么吧。

column10: Once the team breaches the mansion perimeter, they overhear a scene between Yabu and the official we stole the papers from back in Imai town.
column12: Once the team breaches the mansion perimeter, they overhear a scene between Yabu and the official we stole the papers from back in Imai town.

column10: EN
So you simply "lost" these documents, which could lead anyone straight to Mount Tsuru.
column12: 如此重要的文件你就这么“弄丢”了？你知不知道有了这份文件就能找到鹤山去。

column10: Forgive me, Yabu-sama. We also discovered our guards were attacked and Takuma has gone.
column12: 请薮大人恕罪。我们的守卫也遭到了袭击，琢磨…逃走了。

column10: Then you are a fool! No doubt Shogunate men freed Takuma from his prison.
column12: 一群蠢货！还让将军的人把琢磨放跑了。

column10: The old cripple tried to kill me before. If the Shogun does not come for me, Takuma surely will! Do you realize now what your incompetence has cost me?!
column12: 这老瘸子之前就想杀我。现在即使将军不来找我，他也一定会来！因为你的无能，闯了多大的祸？！

column10: Please, Yabu-sama! I have failed you. I am deeply shamed!
column12: 啊啊，薮大人！是我失职，我已无地自容！

column10: Will you grant this humble person permission to commit Seppuku?
column12: 斗胆请求您可否允许小人我切腹谢罪？

column10: Will you grant this humble person an honourable death?
column12: 斗胆请求您可否允许小人我死得有点尊严？

column10: … very well. Perhaps you will at least die with some dignity.
column12: ……可以。就让你死得体面一点吧。

column10: You. Assist him.
Thank you, Yabu-sama!
Quick and be done with it.
Hrm ... damn the Shogun!
Prepare paper and ink. I must write a letter to Kage-sama.
column12: 准备纸笔。我要给影大人写信。

column10: The rest of you, remove this one and clean the floor. You must be finished before I have tea with my wife.
column12: 其他人，把尸体抬走，清理地面。在我和夫人出来用茶之前打扫干净。

column10: The team discusses the revelation that Yabu is indeed not Kage-sama.
column12: The team discusses the revelation that Yabu is indeed not Kage-sama.

column10: EN
Huh … guess he's not Kage-sama after all.
Hmm, indeed. Still, this changes nothing. Lord Yabu must die.
column12: 嗯，看来的确不是。不过，他的命数不会改变，薮大名今天必死无疑。

column10: You're out for him, aren't you? He said as much himself.
column12: 你要找他复仇对吧？他刚才自己也是这么说的。

column10: Oh yes, I have a score to settle, but consider this: if we leave now, he will flee and continue to support Kage-sama.
column12: 啊，是的，我有笔旧账要算。不过也可以这么想：如果现在把他放跑了，他必定会继续为影大人卖命。

column10: He's a bad man … I know it. What do you think, Hayato-sensei?
column12: 他是个坏人……我看得出来。隼人师父，该怎么办呢？

column10: Teh, fine. If you want your revenge, old man, then let's do this. I'll get paid either way.
column12: 好吧。老爷子，你若想报仇，那我们就动手吧。反正给我的佣金不会少。

column10: I see we understand each other.
column12: 很高兴我们能达成一致。

column10: The team discovers a crate of grenades.
column12: The team discovers a crate of grenades.

column10: EN
What's in that crate there … gunpowder?
column12: 那个箱子装的是什么……火药？

column10: That crate … Ugh! ... gunpowder!
Oho, a  fresh supply of black powder. I'll take that, thank you.
column12: 哦，新鲜出炉的黑火药。那我就不客气了，多谢。

column10: When Hayato or Yuki enter water.
column12: When Hayato or Yuki enter water.

column10: EN
I'll swim across.
Haha, lets be like fish.
Oh, I'll pass. Water doesn't go well with my leg, hehehe.
column12: 唔，我就不下水了。对我的腿不好，嘿嘿嘿。

column10: Takuma has taken position on a pavillion and is ready to shoot Yabu with his sniper rifle
column12: Takuma has taken position on a pavillion and is ready to shoot Yabu with his sniper rifle

column10: EN
Let's see … hmm, those trees block most of the inner courtyard from my line of sight .
column12: 让我们瞧瞧……嗯，从我这个角度看，那些树把庭院的大部分都挡住了。

column10: And the part that isn't blocked?
Well, I can see that dog in it's kennel. If Lord Yabu stood very close to it, I could put an end to him there.
column12: 嗯，有个狗舍，还有狗。如果薮大名能站在狗舍前，我就能送他上路。

column10: Ah! We could make the dog bark!
column12: 啊！想办法让狗叫怎么样？

column10: Hm, as good a plan as any. Alright, let's pay that dog a visit.
column12: 嗯，好办法。好，就先去狗那边看看。

column10: Takuma has taken position on a pavillion and is ready to shoot Yabu with his sniper rifle.
column12: Takuma has taken position on a pavillion and is ready to shoot Yabu with his sniper rifle.

column10: EN
Huh, Yabu's dog. It could help us lure out its master. Think I'll wait until Yabu's close, then provoke it with a stone.
column12: 哈，原来是薮的爱犬。可以利用它引出薮。等薮走到附近，我就朝狗扔块石头激怒它。

column10: Ooh, big dog! Watchful! He'll bark if we make noise! Wait until his master is close, then use my birds voice …
column12: 啊哦，好大的狗！小心！要是发出响声，他就会叫。要等他主人靠近后，再吹响鸟笛……

column10: Yabu pets his dog.
EN
Such a fine dog.
Has he been fed properly?
An impressive breed.
None shall disturb him.
A loyal creature.
He is to lack for nothing.
Takuma kills Yabu with a shot to the heart. (Perhaps SLOMO)
column12: Takuma kills Yabu with a shot to the heart. (Perhaps SLOMO)

column10: EN

column9: shot in the heart by Takuma
column10: AGH ... gnhhh …
Hah! How does it feel to be shot down without warning, eh, Lord Yabu? I hope you realized, in that final moment, that it was me who ended you, hehehe!
column12: 在毫无防备的情况下被突然击毙的感觉如何，嗯，薮大名？希望你在临死之前，知道送你上路的人是我，呃哈哈哈！

column10: Farewell, Lord Yabu. I hope you realized, in your final moment, that it was me who ended you, hehehe!
column12: 永别了，薮大名。希望你在临死之前，知道送你上路的人是我，呃哈哈哈！

column10: A servant rings the gong to signal teat time and says one of these lines.
column12: A servant rings the gong to signal teat time and says one of these lines.

column10: EN
Prepare the tea.
Lord Yabu wishes to have tea.
Serve the tea.
The lord will have tea.
The team kills or knocks out the servant that rings the gong to signal tea time.
column12: The team kills or knocks out the servant that rings the gong to signal tea time.

column10: EN
Huh, just a servant.
Sorry.
She was the one signalling for tea. Now it falls to us to ring the gong.
column12: 她是负责敲锣叫茶的。现在，上茶时间由我们把握了。

column10: Either Hayato or Yuki ring the gong that signals tea time. They only say this if the servant is incapacitated, and both fail to be convincing in their own way.
column12: Either Hayato or Yuki ring the gong that signals tea time. They only say this if the servant is incapacitated, and both fail to be convincing in their own way.

column10: EN

column8:
clears throat
tries a high voice
column10: Prepare the tea!
Uh … prepare the tea!
A servant prepares the tea, rings the gong to signal that tea is served  and says one of these lines.
column12: A servant prepares the tea, rings the gong to signal that tea is served  and says one of these lines.

column10: EN
The tea is ready.
Tea is served.
The tea is ready, my lord.
Tea is served, my lord.
The team kills the servant that prepares the tea and rings the gong to signal that tea is served.
column12: The team kills the servant that prepares the tea and rings the gong to signal that tea is served.

column10: EN
Huh, she carried a tray.
Uhm, what's on that plate?
She was serving the tea. Now we must serve it ourselves and ring the gong. Add the poison while you're at it, hehe.
column12: 她是负责上茶的仆人。现在我们要自己上茶然后敲锣。记得上茶前加点毒药，嘿嘿。

column10: Either Hayato or Yuki ring the gong that signals that tea is served. They only say this if the servant is incapacitated, and both fail to be convincing in their own way.
column12: Either Hayato or Yuki ring the gong that signals that tea is served. They only say this if the servant is incapacitated, and both fail to be convincing in their own way.

column10: EN

column8:
clears throat
tries a high voice
column10: The tea is ready!
Uh … the tea is ready!
Yabu drinks tea with his wife.
column12: Yabu drinks tea with his wife.

column10: EN
Hrm, no, this will not do.
Hm, rich flavour.
Ugh, almost cold.
That was not the blend I asked for.
Ugh, unacceptable.
After drinking his tea, Yabu complains to the tea servant.
column12: After drinking his tea, Yabu complains to the tea servant.

column10: EN
Do not serve this one again.
Be quicker next time.
The tea was almost cold.
That was not the blend I asked for.
column12: 我让你调的不是这种茶。

column10: The taste is appalling.
Yabu doesn't hear the signal that tea has been served, and walks back inside the mansion.
column12: Yabu doesn't hear the signal that tea has been served, and walks back inside the mansion.

column10: EN
Are they mocking me? Why hasn't the tea been served yet.
column12: 他们在耍我吗？怎么还不上茶？

column10: I will not be kept waiting. The servants will answer for this.
column12: 我不等了。让上茶的一会给我解释清楚。

column10: This is unacceptable. Whoever is wasting my time, I will cut off their head.
column12: 气死我了。是谁敢浪费我时间，我要砍他们头。

column10: Hayato or Yuki reach the island where tea is served for Yabu and his guests.
column12: Hayato or Yuki reach the island where tea is served for Yabu and his guests.

column10: EN
Heh … even the island is guarded.
Tea. Have to slip in the poison. Nasty stuff.
column12: 还得往茶里面加毒药。感觉真不好。

column10: Yuki slips the poison into the tea.
column12: Yuki slips the poison into the tea.

column10: EN
Now there's a spider in the tea.
column12: 感觉像在茶里放了只毒蜘蛛。

column10: Better get out of here then.
Hai, sensei!
Quick now!
Yabu drinks his poisoned tea.
EN
Poison! ...The old cripple! … N-noo ...
column12: 茶里有毒！……老瘸子！……混-混蛋 ……

column10: Heh … sounded unpleasant.
What was in that bottle?!
Oh, just a little bit of pain, so he knew it was me who ended him.
column12: 哦，只是稍微放了点我受的苦痛进去，这样他才晓得是我下的手。

column10: Oh, years of pain, concentrated and distilled. Just so he knew it was me who got to him in the end, hehehe.
column12: 哦，是我多年所受的苦痛，浓缩提取后的产物。所以他才晓得是我下的手，呵呵呵。

column10: You're scary, Takuma-sama.
column12: 您现在好可怕啊，琢磨大师。

column10: Hohoho, I have my moments.
column12: 呵呵呵，老夫倒是很享受此时此刻。

column10: Right after Revenge1 or Revenge2
EN
Lord Yabu has been killed! Find the assassins!
column12: 薮大人被暗杀了！快搜刺客！

column10: And there's the alarm. I think it's time to test these matchlock pistols.
column12: 警报已经发出。是时候试试火绳枪的威力了。

column10: An excellent idea.
Are they quiet too? Like your leg?
column12: 火绳枪也是消音的吗？和你的木腿一样？

column10: Not so much I'm afraid. Choose your targets carefully, child.
column12: 可惜，没那么好。所以，选择目标的时候要多加小心，孩子。

column10: The team has to sneak through guards on high alert
column12: The team has to sneak through guards on high alert

column10: EN
Heh, more guards.
They're looking for us.
High alert everywhere. What now, old man?
column12: 到处都在高度戒备。该怎么办，老爷子？

column10: We're almost free. Let's not lose our heads now, eh?
column12: 马上就能逃出去了，切勿自乱阵脚，明白吗？

column10: The team leaves the compound.
EN
Hehe, free at last.
I'm out!
Close one. You really wanted to see that man dead, didn't you?
column12: 好险。你对他还真是恨之入骨啊？

column10: Hmm, sometimes you have to make a decision, and I made that one years ago.
column12: 嗯，人有时候是要靠决心活下去的，我这么多年就是靠憋着这口恶气熬下来的。

column10: The team have successfully escaped
EN
All here?
Here!
Heh, indeed.
So, we've done it. Lord Yabu's dead. Guess we'll have to find a new lead on Kage-sama.
column12: 总之，任务完成，薮大名已死。接下来要另起别的线索追查影大人了。

column10: Oh, I wouldn't worry. I suspect he will come to us, now that we have dealt him a massive blow. At any rate, we should return to Mugen.
column12: 啊，此事无需多虑。依我看，既然我们已给他当头一棒，他必会主动找上门来。总之，先回去与无限碰头再说吧。

column10: Right, right let's get out of here.
MISSION-WORDCOUNT EN:
